cleaned_text: Balance - Aromatherapy Spray Balance - Aromatherapy Spray $13.00 This spray is designed to balance mood and refresh the spirit. Clary Sage is a wonderful ally for balancing hormones and clearing the skin. Ylang ylang has a deep sweet smell. It reminds us that life is delicious and we are enough. This spray is uplifting and will bring a smile to your face everytime. Quantity: 2 oz Ingredients: Water, Alcohol, Essential Oils of Clary Sage and Ylang Ylang *These products have not been evaluated by the US Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Always notify your physician of any herbal products/supplements you may be using internally.
